message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that holds immense value. While I can't disclose specifics about its nature, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm confident it holds significant potential for you as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This represents a great value considering its worth. Please let me know your decision.
